Tundun Abiola bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria na onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo na Arise News.
A mụrụ Abiola n'aka onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Chief MKO Abiola
O kwuru na Sir David Frost, Ruth Benemesia-Opia, Siene Allwell-Brown na Ronke Ayuba bụ ndị mmụọ nsọ ya.
A họpụtara ya maka 2021 Nigeria Outlook Women Trailblazer Awards
Abiola lụrụ Atama Attah amụrụ na Benue Steeti na Claridges Hotel, Mayfair, London, ọ kwụsịrị obere oge.
